Title: Above Boon Keng MRT
Description:
'Move-in from 28 Aug 2023. Above Boon Kent MRT (3 stations from Dhoby Ghaut MRT). For single male Professionals. No overcrowding, no children, your privacy and a clean environment guaranteed.  Rent includes: utilities, wifi. This listing is updated regularly and available if still listed. Tenants will be registered with HDB and Tenancy Agreement filed with IRAS. Scroll to end of listing for list of neighbourhood amenities. 

Can add aircon for $80/mth

Viewing is only scheduled after you have read the full listing details (note: male tenants only) and messaged answers to the following qns: 
1) Name, ethnicity and nationality. For foreigners pls state type of pass (e.g. EP, S pass, etc) 
2) Company, nature of job and work arrangements (e.g. work from home, etc)
3) Choosing aircon add-on? Pls note that aircon is extra. Priority given for choosing air-on option
4) What lease duration (e.g. 6/12 mths) and when do u intend to start? 
5) Do u have any special requirements and/or bringing any furniture?

Unbeatable location and convenience. Directly above Boon Keng MRT.

Furnished with single bed, wardrobe, table, fan & mirror
Use of fridge, washing machine, laundry rack

Rent includes: utilities, wifi, complimentary mattress cleaning (at least once every 8mths) and air con servicing (at least once every 6mths), cleaning of common areas, clothes detergent/fabric softener

Your room privacy guaranteed

Amenities immediately below block:
24hours McDonalds
Coffeeshop
Hair salon
Minimart

Amenities 50 - 100m from block:
Multiple food-stalls/coffeeshops
Thrift store/$value
UOB bank branch
Bubble tea (iTea, Liho, Partea)
Hair salons
Bakeries, fruit stalls
Appliance stores
Hardware stores

Amenities within 200m:
NTUC
Sheng Siong
DBS bank branch
Hawker Centre/Wet Market
KFC
Bakeries
Post office
Medical & dental clinics

Tenants should be quiet and neat (professionals). Strictly no smoking, loud music or agents

Males only due to shower/toilet layout. Strictly 1 pax only.

1 mth confirmation deposit to reserve room

I may not respond to messages/queries covering points mentioned above.'
